\Authlete\Laravel\Web

\Authlete\Laravel\WebResponseUtility

Utility to generate Response instances.

All responses created by methods in this class has Cache-Control: no-store and Pragma: no-cache.

Methods

okJson()

okJson(string  $content) : \Illuminate\Http\Response

Create a response having the given content formatted in "application/json;charset=UTF-8" with the HTTP status code "200 OK".

Parameters

string $content

The content formatted in application/json;charset=UTF-8.

Returns

\Illuminate\Http\Response —

An HTTP response with "200 OK" and JSON.

static

location()

location(string  $location) : \Illuminate\Http\Response

Parameters

The value of the Location header.

unauthorized()

unauthorized(string  $challenge,   $content = null) : \Illuminate\Http\Response

Create a response with the HTTP status code "401 Unauthorized" and optionally with JSON.

Parameters

string $challenge

The value of the WWW-Authenticate header.
$content

The content formatted in `application/json;charset=UTF-8'. This parameter is optional.

Returns

\Illuminate\Http\Response —

An HTTP response with "401 Unauthorized" and optionally with JSON.

static

wwwAuthenticate()

wwwAuthenticate(integer  $statusCode, string  $challenge, string  $content = null) : \Illuminate\Http\Response

Create a response with a WWW-Authenticate header.

Parameters

integer $statusCode

HTTP status code of the response.
string $challenge

The value of the WWW-Authenticate header.
string $content

The content formatted in `application/json;charset=UTF-8'. This parameter is optional.

Returns

\Illuminate\Http\Response —

An HTTP response with the specified status code and a WWW-Authenticate header, and optionally with JSON.

static
